com.wit.android.widget.adapter

Interface AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseAdapter, BaseCursorAdapter, BaseCursorMultiAdapter, BaseMultiAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    AdapterOptimizer

    public static interface AdapterOptimizer.OptimizedAdapter

    Class Overview

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getItemViewType(int position)
      See android.widget.BaseAdapter#getItemViewType(int).
      LayoutInflater getLayoutInflater()
      Returns layout inflater.
      void onBindItemView(int position, java.lang.Object viewHolder)
      Invoked to bind item view with data.
      View onCreateItemView(int position, LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup root)
      Invoked to create view for the item from the adapter data set.
      java.lang.Object onCreateItemViewHolder(int position, View itemView)
      Invoked to obtain view holder for the actually created item view.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateItemView

        View onCreateItemView(int position,
                    LayoutInflater inflater,
                    ViewGroup root)

        Invoked to create view for the item from the adapter data set. This is invoked only if the convert view is equal to null. To create view you can use the given inflater or create it manually.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of view in the adapter view.
        inflater - Layout inflater provided by getLayoutInflater().
        root - Parent view.
        Returns:
        Created item view.

      • onBindItemView

        void onBindItemView(int position,
                  java.lang.Object viewHolder)

        Invoked to bind item view with data. This is invoked whether the getView() method on the adapter is called.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of view in the adapter view.
        viewHolder - View holder of the actual item view on the given position. This is also holder which was set to the view by onCreateItemViewHolder() method while was view created.

      • onCreateItemViewHolder

        java.lang.Object onCreateItemViewHolder(int position,
                                      View itemView)

        Invoked to obtain view holder for the actually created item view.

        Parameters:
        position - Position of the itemView in the adapter view.
        itemView - View returned by onCreateItemView method.
        Returns:
        Holder for the requested item's view.

      • getLayoutInflater

        LayoutInflater getLayoutInflater()

        Returns layout inflater.

        Returns:
        Layout inflater.

      • getItemViewType

        int getItemViewType(int position)

        See android.widget.BaseAdapter#getItemViewType(int).
